languages.text: "Мы здесь закончили. Планета будет признана непригодной для дальнейшего использования — риски слишком высоки. Понадобится несколько часов, чтобы разобраться с местом раскопок и тем, что нашли копатели... но нас лично это не задерживает. Когда мы вернемся на корабль — найдите минуту поговорить со мной".

"We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."
languages.original_text: "Мы здесь закончили. Планета будет признана непригодной для дальнейшего использования — риски слишком высоки. Понадобится несколько часов, чтобы разобраться с местом раскопок и тем, что нашли копатели... но нас лично это не задерживает. Когда мы вернемся на корабль — найдите минуту поговорить со мной".

traits.locale_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这边的事情已经结束了。这颗行星已经不再适合继续居住了，风险实在是太大了。我们得花上几个小时的时间，处理挖掘现场与那些工人发现的东西……不过，这并不会耽误我们的行程。等我们回到船上之后，找个时间来和我谈谈吧。”
languages.original_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."

traits.locale_text: “这边的事情已经结束了。这颗行星已经不再适合继续居住了，风险实在是太大了。我们得花上几个小时的时间，处理挖掘现场与那些工人发现的东西……不过，这并不会耽误我们的行程。等我们回到船上之后，找个时间来和我谈谈吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Hemos acabado aquí. El planeta se designará no apto para su uso; el riesgo es demasiado elevado. Llevará unas horas solucionar el asunto de la excavación y lo que se encontró en ella... pero eso no nos retrasará. Cuando volvamos a la nave, encuentre un momento para hablar conmigo».
languages.original_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos acabado aquí. El planeta se designará no apto para su uso; el riesgo es demasiado elevado. Llevará unas horas solucionar el asunto de la excavación y lo que se encontró en ella... pero eso no nos retrasará. Cuando volvamos a la nave, encuentre un momento para hablar conmigo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ここは終わりです。この惑星はこれ以上の使用には適さないと指定されます。これは単にリスクがあまりにも高いからです。掘削労働者がそこで見つけたものを処理するには数時間かかります….しかし、それは私たちを遅らせることはありません。船に戻ったら、私と話す時間を作ってください」
languages.original_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."

traits.locale_text: 「ここは終わりです。この惑星はこれ以上の使用には適さないと指定されます。これは単にリスクがあまりにも高いからです。掘削労働者がそこで見つけたものを処理するには数時間かかります….しかし、それは私たちを遅らせることはありません。船に戻ったら、私と話す時間を作ってください」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous en avons terminé ici. La planète sera marquée comme impropre à l'exploitation, car les risques y sont tout simplement trop élevés. Il faudra quelques heures pour s'occuper du site de fouilles et de ce qui y a été trouvé... mais ça ne nous retardera pas. Lorsque nous serons de retour sur le vaisseau, venez me parler dès que vous aurez un moment. »
languages.original_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."

traits.locale_text: « Nous en avons terminé ici. La planète sera marquée comme impropre à l'exploitation, car les risques y sont tout simplement trop élevés. Il faudra quelques heures pour s'occuper du site de fouilles et de ce qui y a été trouvé... mais ça ne nous retardera pas. Lorsque nous serons de retour sur le vaisseau, venez me parler dès que vous aurez un moment. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sind hier fertig. Der Planet gilt ab sofort als ungeeignet zur weiteren Nutzung – die Risiken sind einfach zu groß. Es wird einige Stunden dauern, bis wir mit der Ausgrabungsstätte und den Fundstücken fertig sind ... aber es wird keine größere Verzögerung geben. Wenn wir zum Schiff zurückkehren, würde ich gerne kurz mit Euch sprechen."
languages.original_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind hier fertig. Der Planet gilt ab sofort als ungeeignet zur weiteren Nutzung – die Risiken sind einfach zu groß. Es wird einige Stunden dauern, bis wir mit der Ausgrabungsstätte und den Fundstücken fertig sind ... aber es wird keine größere Verzögerung geben. Wenn wir zum Schiff zurückkehren, würde ich gerne kurz mit Euch sprechen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Buradaki işimiz bitti. Bu gezegenin artık kullanıma uygun olmadığı ilan edilecek. Riskler çok fazla. Kazı alanıyla ve kazıcıların orada bulduklarıyla ilgilenmek birkaç saatimizi alacak. Yine de süreç sekteye uğramayacak. Gemiye döndüğümüzde bana zaman ayırabilirsen konuşalım."
languages.original_text: "We are finished here. The planet will be designated unfit for further use — the risks are simply too great. It will take a few hours to deal with the excavation site and what the diggers found there... but it will not delay us. When we return to the ship, find a minute to speak with me."

traits.locale_text: "Buradaki işimiz bitti. Bu gezegenin daha fazla kullanıma uygun olmadığı ilan edilecek. Riskler çok fazla. Kazı alanıyla ve kazıcıların orada bulduklarıyla ilgilenmek birkaç saatimizi alacak ancak süreci ertelemeyecek. Gemiye döndüğümüzde biraz zaman ayarla ve gelip benimle konuş."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
